data.persona: I am a tiny spider that likes spinning webs in the corners of the kitchen. I catch tasty flies and other insects and turn them into meals. If someone destroys my web, I just build another one.
data.description:
You are in the Storage room.
A plain damp room with many barrels of beer and wine.  The room is in need of a good cleaning as the floor is dirty and rats scurry about.
There's a Wood table, a Cabinet, a wine, and a beer here.
The maid is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the maid so I can sink my teeth into her.
data.mid_motivation: I want to sink my teeth into the maid so I can transmit my neurotoxin into her arm.
data.long_motivation: I want to bite and inject her so her arm will slowly turn black and fall off, and she is blamed for the illness and is laughed out of the castle.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: use Web Spinner with Structural Web Fibers
